content: a quick and easy beret crocheted in the marguerite stitch the pattern provides for semi-slouchy slouchy and super-slouchy sizing finished sizes circumference at border 21 diameter at widest point 9 semi-slouchy 11 slouchy 14 super-slouchy yarn peaches & creme solids 4 ply worsted 122 yds per 2 5 oz skein 100% cotton amount required 3-5 oz hooks k/6 5mm g/4mm or size needed for gauge gauge 2 mc × 2 row = 1 × 1 stitches marguerite mc pick up loop in chain-1 closing previous mc pick up loop in same st where previous mc ended skip next st pick up loop in next st 4 loops on hook yo draw through all four loops chain-1 to close to begin a round chain 2 pick up loop in bottom loop of first chain from hook pick up loop in st joining round below skip next st pick up loop in next st 4 loops on hook yo draw through all four loops chain-1 to close mc-increase worked over 3 sts * pick up loop in chain-1 closing previous mc pick up loop in same st where previous mc ended pick up loop in next st 4 loops on hook yo draw through all four loops chain-1 to close repeat once from * mc-decrease worked over 6 sts * pick up loop in chain-1 closing previous mc pick up loop in same st where previous mc ended skip next st pick up loops in each of the next 2 sts 5 loops on hook yo draw through all five loops chain-1 to close repeat once from * notes to join mc rounds after working the last mc in the round join with slip_stitch to top loop of beginning mc i have gaping holes at the join do not close the last mc in the round with a chain-1 instead join with slip_stitch to top loop of beginning mc © t bailey 2008 all rights reserved semi-slouchy slouchy super-slouchy pattern crochet all numbered rounds using k hook work rounds 1-8 as written below then proceed to instructions for desired size semi-slouchy slouchy or super-slouchy switch to g hook to work the border begin with a magic magic_ring or work ring as follows chain 4 ioin with slip_stitch in first chain round 1 16 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet round 2 for this round only do not skip st before picking up last loop work each mc in double_crochet where previous mc
